version_description:
In this update:
- Added augmented sixth chords (Italian, French, German).
- Added patterns to demonstrate approach and resolution of the newly added chords.
- Added the Double Harmonic Major scale.
- Exported MIDI files now use the BPM specified in the song.
- Other stability improvements.

In this update:
- Added augmented sixth chords (Italian, French, German).
- Added patterns to demonstrate approach and resolution of the newly added chords.
- Added the Double Harmonic Major scale.
- Exported MIDI files now use the BPM specified in the song.
- Other stability improvements.

Big update!
• On iPad, there is now a live piano on screen.
• Stability improvements on the MIDI output.
• The extension of triads is now an option.

Thanks for your precious feedback!

Big update!
• On iPad, there is now a live piano on screen.
• Stability improvements on the MIDI output.
• The extension of triads is now an option.

Thanks for your precious feedback!

Here's what's new.
- Section playback : you can now start playback at the beginning of any song section (you can loop sections too).
- New chord types : 11, #11, b11, m11, Maj11, mMaj11, 13, m13, Maj13, mMaj13.
- MIDI output : during playback and export, chords are no longer staccato (they fill the whole note duration).
- MIDI output : chords are now properly arpeggiated when received by external apps.
- MIDI output : improved stability regarding stuck notes.
- Various minor UI improvements.

Thank you so much for your continuous feedback!

Here's what's new.
- Section playback : you can now start playback at the beginning of any song section (you can loop sections too).
- New chord types : 11, #11, b11, m11, Maj11, mMaj11, 13, m13, Maj13, mMaj13.
- MIDI output : during playback and export, chords are no longer staccato (they fill the whole note duration).
- MIDI output : chords are now properly arpeggiated when received by external apps.
- MIDI output : improved stability regarding stuck notes.
- Various minor UI improvements.

Thank you so much for your continuous feedback!
Resolved an issue with the MIDI output.  It now works properly with Ableton Live too.
Resolved an issue with the MIDI output.  It now works properly with Ableton Live too.

- Improved the UI for controlling looping and the metronome. Metronome can now be easily toggled on or off at any time.
- The metronome can now be heard even if no instrument is selected.
- Reworked the playback system to address latency and looping issues.
- Corrected the transposition of slashed chords.

- Improved the UI for controlling looping and the metronome. Metronome can now be easily toggled on or off at any time.
- The metronome can now be heard even if no instrument is selected.
- Reworked the playback system to address latency and looping issues.
- Corrected the transposition of slashed chords.

Version 5.2
- Improved the UI for controlling looping and the metronome. Metronome can now be easily toggled on or off at any time.
- The metronome can now be heard even if no instrument is selected.
- Reworked the playback system to address latency and looping issues.
- Corrected the transposition of slashed chords.

Version 5.2.2
- improved compatibility with older versions of iOS.

Version 5.2
- Improved the UI for controlling looping and the metronome. Metronome can now be easily toggled on or off at any time.
- The metronome can now be heard even if no instrument is selected.
- Reworked the playback system to address latency and looping issues.
- Corrected the transposition of slashed chords.

Version 5.2.2
- improved compatibility with older versions of iOS.

- Increased the size of the chord duration button to make it easier to press.
- Various improvements and bugfixes with the chord playback.

- Increased the size of the chord duration button to make it easier to press.
- Various improvements and bugfixes with the chord playback.

Huge update!
- MIDI input : it is now possible to trigger chords externally through MIDI. This opens up the possibilities tremendously!
- sound can now be easily turned off with the press of a button.
- added the altered dominant scale.
- added more altered chords : 7#5, 7b5b9, 7b5#9, 7#5b9, 7#5#9.
- other small improvements.

Huge update!
- MIDI input : it is now possible to trigger chords externally through MIDI. This opens up the possibilities tremendously!
- sound can now be easily turned off with the press of a button.
- added the altered dominant scale.
- added more altered chords : 7#5, 7b5b9, 7b5#9, 7#5b9, 7#5#9.
- other small improvements.

- added support for AudioBus 3.
- the mute button is now on the iPhone version too.
- minor UI adjustments and bugfixes.

- added support for AudioBus 3.
- the mute button is now on the iPhone version too.
- minor UI adjustments and bugfixes.

- improved support for Audiobus 3.
- improved support for iOS 11.

- improved support for Audiobus 3.
- improved support for iOS 11.
resolved an issue with the CoreMIDI options.
resolved an issue with the CoreMIDI options.

- the app icon was given a fresher look
- there is now an option to control whether to play the bass note
- in-app purchases are now more reliable and easier to manage

- the app icon was given a fresher look
- there is now an option to control whether to play the bass note
- in-app purchases are now more reliable and easier to manage
Fixed an issue with the chord shown in the alterations menu.
Fixed an issue with the chord shown in the alterations menu.

- The app now fully embraces the iOS 11 look.
- MIDI input can now be configured as omni channel.
- Various UI improvements.

- The app now fully embraces the iOS 11 look.
- MIDI input can now be configured as omni channel.
- Various UI improvements.

This update introduces a bunch of new features!
- You can now specify a time signature.
- Now compatible with Ableton Link, for syncing tempos with other apps (play/stop sync also supported).
- With Ableton Link active, a blinking light indicates the tempo.
- With Ableton Link active, you can now quantize the touched chords to the next beat or the next bar.
- Playback can now be started through Audiobus (added support for the play trigger).
- The default note duration can be specified in the options.
- Resolved an issue where the app would remain in a yellow screen at startup under certain conditions.
- various other bugfixes.

This update introduces a bunch of new features!
- You can now specify a time signature.
- Now compatible with Ableton Link, for syncing tempos with other apps (play/stop sync also supported).
- With Ableton Link active, a blinking light indicates the tempo.

-Resolved a MIDI output issue that occurred when pressing repetitively on a chord.
- Resolved an issue with the initial value of the tempo when a document is opened.

-Resolved a MIDI output issue that occurred when pressing repetitively on a chord.
- Resolved an issue with the initial value of the tempo when a document is opened.

- more possibilities for the song edition : implemented cut/copy/paste for individual chords, but most importantly, for sections.
- added haptic feedback for devices that support it.
- documents are sorted in order of creation.
- added the major blues scale.

- more possibilities for the song edition : implemented cut/copy/paste for individual chords, but most importantly, for sections.
- added haptic feedback for devices that support it.
- documents are sorted in order of creation.
- added the major blues scale.
- improved stability.
- improved stability.

- The MIDI Triggers editor now has a button to automatically assign each keyboard key to its associated triad.
- Stability improvements.

- The MIDI Triggers editor now has a button to automatically assign each keyboard key to its associated triad.
- Stability improvements.

- You can now do a long press on a document to access document-specific actions.
- There its a new option to control the pad size in the song view and the suggestion view.
- In the iPad version, the document title bar is now smaller, leaving more screen space for the document itself.
- The alteration menu was greatly improved:
- Chord qualities are presented in three categories : diatonic chords, secondary chords and chromatic chords.
- The "Inversions and octave shifts" section is now called "Voicings".
- Under Voicings, the closest voicing to the preceding chord is now identified.
- The other voicings are listed in increasing order.
- In the iPad version, the alteration view is now bigger on screen.

- You can now do a long press on a document to access document-specific actions.
- There its a new option to control the pad size in the song view and the suggestion view.
- In the iPad version, the document title bar is now smaller, leaving more screen space for the document itself.
- The alteration menu was greatly improved:
- Chord qualities are presented in three categories : diatonic chords, secondary chords and chromatic chords.
- The "Inversions and octave shifts" section is now called "Voicings".
- Under Voicings, the closest voicing to the preceding chord is now identified.
- The other voicings are listed in increasing order.
- In the iPad version, the alteration view is now bigger on screen.

- added a new built-in instrument: strings
- Improved the quality of all built-in instruments
- voicings and alt bass alterations are now more flexible
- minor bugfixes

- added a new built-in instrument: strings
- Improved the quality of all built-in instruments
- voicings and alt bass alterations are now more flexible
- minor bugfixes

- Added compatibility with Bluetooth MIDI Devices.
- The metronome tick is louder.
- Resolved an issue with background playback.

- Added compatibility with Bluetooth MIDI Devices.
- The metronome tick is louder.
- Resolved an issue with background playback.
Audio is now properly restored after an interruption, such as a phone call.
Audio is now properly restored after an interruption, such as a phone call.

- Improved the spelling of chords and scales. The app is now more faithful to music theory.
- A new option was added to simplify the accidentals and thus avoid uncommon ones.
- Minor bugfixes.

Resolved an issue with the loading of instruments in iOS 9 and iOS 10.
Resolved an issue with the loading of instruments in iOS 9 and iOS 10.

Big Update!
This version of Suggester introduces support for the Document Browser, a new way to manage your documents. The new features include a seamless integration with iCloud and a more unified experience. It also comes with various improvements and bugfixes throughout the app. Enjoy!

Big Update!
This version of Suggester introduces support for the Document Browser, a new way to manage your documents. The new features include a seamless integration with iCloud and a more unified experience. It also comes with various improvements and bugfixes throughout the app. Enjoy!

- The duration for chord previews can now be controlled in the Options.
- Added a new note duration : double whole note.
Chord inversions are now correctly handled when transposing a song.

Resolved an issue causing stuck notes with the MIDI Triggers under certain conditions.
Removed the UI associated with the AppStore receipt.

- In the Document Browser, the document thumbnail now shows the scale that is used.
- To facilitate importing into a DAW, the MIDI track of an exported MIDI file is named according to the Suggester document title.
- Resolved an issue with the MIDI export command.
- Resolved an issue where the tutorial buttons would sometimes not display correctly.

version 8.0.2
- Resolved an issue with the time signature view on older iOS versions.

- The relative scale of the natural minor scale is now correct.
- Included the parallel key is the suggested scales for modulation.

Many functional improvements :
- Replaced the old drag and drop system with the new iOS native drag and drop.
- Implemented the new contextual menus in iOS 13.
- Chords can be dragged between Suggester and ChordPadX.
- Chords can be dragged to apps that support MIDI drag and drop.
- The UI properly reacts to the window size when Multitasking on iPad.

Many functional improvements :
- Replaced the old drag and drop system with the new iOS native drag and drop.
- Implemented the new contextual menus in iOS 13.
- Chords can be dragged between Suggester and ChordPadX.
- Chords can be dragged to apps that support MIDI drag and drop.
- The UI properly reacts to the window size when Multitasking on iPad.
Resolved an issue with the export of MIDI data.
Resolved an issue with the export of MIDI data.

- The "Hide Sharp Scales" option was replaced with something smarter : "Hide Complicated Enharmonic Scales".
- Scales can now be dragged as MIDI.
- Individual chords and scales can now be exported as MIDI files.
- Improved the store UI.
- Stability improvements.

- The "Hide Sharp Scales" option was replaced with something smarter : "Hide Complicated Enharmonic Scales".
- Scales can now be dragged as MIDI.
- Individual chords and scales can now be exported as MIDI files.
- Improved the store UI.
- Stability improvements.
Stability improvements.
Stability improvements.

- Support for AudioUnit (AUv3).
- Notes from the MIDI input are now played on the selected instrument.
- It is no longer necessary to close the document to access the App Options.
- Resolved a specific issue that could sometimes result in stuck notes.
- Brought back the Auto Triads button in MIDI Triggers.
- Fixed the display of the Help section in older iOS versions.
- Improvements in the UI layout.
- Improved performance.
- Stability improvements.

- Support for AudioUnit (AUv3).

- Resolved an issue with the Locked Mode message in the AudioUnit.
- Resolved an issue with the Locked Mode message in the AudioUnit.

- Corrected a mistake in the augmented 6th resolutions.
- Improved compatibility for small screen spaces:
- The chord picker and the scale picker react better when vertical screen space is tight.
- The piano now collapses if vertical screen space is tight.

- Corrected a mistake in the augmented 6th resolutions.
- Improved compatibility for small screen spaces:
- The chord picker and the scale picker react better when vertical screen space is tight.
- The piano now collapses if vertical screen space is tight.

- Added support for device rotation on iPhone. That's especially interesting if you have one of the Plus screens.
- The metronome tick is now louder on the first tick of a bar.
- Added 4 new scale types :
- Aeolian Dominant
- Locrian #2
- Dorian #4
- Neutral Pentatonic

- Aeolian Dominant
- Locrian #2

- Neutral Pentatonic

- Refreshed the look and layout of the Suggestions section.
- Various minor UI improvements.
- Stability improvements.

- Stability improvements.
Resolved an issue with the appearance of the song items when using drag and drop in Dark Mode.
Resolved an issue with the appearance of the song items when using drag and drop in Dark Mode.

• Alterations have been redesigned :
- A higher number of chords can now be shown at the same time, reducing the need to scroll.
- The piano has been added at the top of that view for visualization.
• The Relative Key was added to the list of keys to borrow from.
• Resolved an issue with the appearance of the "Borrow From Scale" view.

• Alterations have been redesigned :
- A higher number of chords can now be shown at the same time, reducing the need to scroll.
- The piano has been added at the top of that view for visualization.
• The Relative Key was added to the list of keys to borrow from.
• Resolved an issue with the appearance of the "Borrow From Scale" view.

- Sections now have a play count.
- A piano was added to the Chord Catalog.

- Sections now have a play count.
- A piano was added to the Chord Catalog.

- Added new note durations: dotted whole and dotted 16th.
- Improved the note and rest duration images.
- Minor bugfixes.

- Added new note durations: dotted whole and dotted 16th.
- Improved the note and rest duration images.
- Minor bugfixes.

- Improved the look of the tutorial.
- Audiobus stability improvements.

- Improved the look of the tutorial.
- Audiobus stability improvements.
The time signature and tempo are now included when you export a song either as MIDI or as text.
The time signature and tempo are now included when you export a song either as MIDI or as text.

- in AudioUnit mode, playback state and position is now entirely controlled from the AudioUnit host (the DAW).
- improved the timing precision of MIDI messages.
- resolved an issue with the preview of chords when using the guitar instrument.
- minor UI improvements.

- in AudioUnit mode, playback state and position is now entirely controlled from the AudioUnit host (the DAW).

- Added a Hear button in the Chord Detector.
- Removed the play button on the section headers when running in AudioUnit mode.

- Added a Hear button in the Chord Detector.
- Removed the play button on the section headers when running in AudioUnit mode.

- Song can now be looped in AudioUnit, even if the DAW does not support looping.
- Resolved an issue with MIDI file export when sections are repeated.
- Resolved an issue with the colour scheme that emerged in iOS 13.4.
- Improved the visual feedback for the mute, loop and metronome buttons.
- Controls are now dimmed during playback, to indicate they cannot be interacted with.
- The AudioUnit now features the same colour scheme as the main app.
- Resolved an audio issue with the AudioUnit when used in AUM.

- Song can now be looped in AudioUnit, even if the DAW does not support looping.

• Custom chords can be created from scratch
• Chord intervals can be altered
• Inversions and alt bass can now be used at the same time
• The chord detector now proposes custom chords if none of the built-in chords or their inversions match
• Sixth chords are now notated 6 instead of add6
• Augmented chords are now notated + instead of aug
• Augmented 7th chords are now notated +7 instead of 7#5
• Diminished chords are now notated o instead of dim
• Half-diminished 7th chords are now notated ø7 instead of m7b5
• Monads are now notated 1 instead of a small note symbol
• 7#5b9 is now notated aug7b9
• 7#5b9 is now notated aug7#9
• Resolved an issue with monads on the guitar instrument
• Several UI improvements

Added support for iOS 14.
Introduced a new file format which reduces the size of documents, while maintaining backward compatibility with existing documents.
Resolved an issue that could produce stuck notes when toggling the mute button during playback.
Improved error handling when opening documents.
Added a Copy button in the ChordCatalog.
Various minor UI improvements.

Improved stability when using inversions and alt bass in the same chord.
Resolved an issue when editing sections that have the same name and the same play count.

- Modulation is now possible across major scales, even without the Full Unlock.
- When the app is locked, it is now easier to understand what chords and scales are available to use.
- Improved the tutorial text.
- Other minor UI improvements.

- Modulation is now possible across major scales, even without the Full Unlock.
- When the app is locked, it is now easier to understand what chords and scales are available to use.
- Improved the tutorial text.
- Other minor UI improvements.

- Improved the way the guitar chords are made, they now use standard chord shapes.
- Added support for alt bass with the guitar instrument.
- Slowed down the timing of the strumming for a more natural feel.
- Improved the guitar sound.
- Added a message in order to reduce the confusion about inversions and octave shifts when the guitar instrument is used.
- Resolved an issue with MIDI Triggers which allowed a MIDI key to be mapped twice.
- Added a confirmation message when an already mapped MIDI trigger is about to be remapped.
- Resolved an issue with the generation of notes when using MIDI Triggers with the guitar instrument.
